name: Blaster Proficiency
Lore: 'Some people think that hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side.',
Text: 'USED: If you just targeted with a blaster, add 3 to your weapon destiny.LOST: Lose 1 Force to cause one opponent''s character just ''hit'' to be immediately placed in Lost Pile. OR Cancel Levitation Attack.',
